name: Chess Match II
description:
Chess Match II is a simple matching/memory game that you play in your browser. You click on the cards to find matching pairs of famous amateur chess players.

Be sure to also check out Chess Match I.

Credits:

Cover image is from PNGGURU.

Other images are in the public domain - from WIKIPEDIA.

Based upon the javascript tutorial by Tania Rascia.

License: MIT.
